text: Logon ko uss din say hoshiyaar ker dey jab kay unn kay pass azab aajaye ga aur zalim kahen gay aey humaray rab humen boht thoray qarib kay waqt tak ki hi mohlat dey kay hum teri tableegh maan len aur teray payghumbaron ki tabeydaari mein lagg jayen. Kiya tum iss say pehlay bhi qasmen nahi kha rahey thay? Kay tumharay liye duniya say talna hi nahi
